page.title: 06Police
page.content: There is a 24 hour cover for the aera by the Police which is mainly based at Easingwold. A number of different police constable man the patrol car which has three different drivers throughout the 24 hour of cover.Rural officers, sometimes called Community Policemen, used to be called country bat men, or vilalge policemen are based in the surrounding villages of Sutton, Raskelf and Linton. They share responsibility for this area. The largest problem in area is domestic disputes, also minor vandalism which rarely gets solved. There are a few problems related to drinkwhcih appears to be more common with under age drinkers. it is a relatively crime free area with few motoring offences. Nearest court at EAsingwold sits fortnightly.
